amendment.description: Amendment requires agencies and OMB's Office of Information and Regulatory Affairs (OIRA) to report the cost of unfunded mandates imposed through the regulatory process.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part A of House Report 114-388 to require monthly reporting of unfunded mandates by agencies to OIRA; requires reporting of unfunded mandates imposed in OIRA's annual cumulative assessment of agency rule making.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Foxx.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
